"Procurement of the heavy armor of Gilna:
"Various ingredients are being handled, and the
equipment around the kitchen have been
significantly strengthened. However, and it is
because of this, that the pot has been in use up
till this time, is now worned out.. At this juncture,
I would like a new pot, but not one with ordinary
materials. I will like to have one that can even
withstand the flame technique of a high level
Wizard! Please!
*Target Gilnas of Lv.60 and above"

"色々な素材を扱うようになって、
厨房の機材まわりも結構強化してきたん
だけど、そのせいなのか今まで使っていた
お鍋がダメになっちゃったの……
そこで新しいお鍋が欲しいのだけど、
普通の素材じゃなくて、それこそ
高レベルのフォースの炎テクニックにも
耐えうるものが欲しいの！　お願いっ！

※Lv.60～のギルナスが対象"
